availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Augustus B. Culton (Knox County, Kentucky soldier)

body.p: Knox County, Kentucky soldier. Kentucky native. Served in the 49th Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as Captain from June 1, 1863 to December 14, 1863. Served in the 49th Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as 1st Lieutenant from December 14, 1863 to February 3, 1864. Died in military service at Somerset, Kentucky on February 3, 1864.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Knox County, Barbourville, p. 25.
